headline: The U.S. Wants to Test Nukes. What That Means for Defense Stocks.
summary: President Donald Trump wants the Department of Defense to start testing nuclear weapons again, something America hasn’t done since 1992.  For now, investors want to know what it could mean for defense stocks.  The short answer is not much—though they might want to brush up on America’s nuclear capabilities.
